properties.areaDesc: Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 7 at 4:17AM EST until January 8 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy freezing spray at a rate of 2 cm per hour or
greater expected, and may rapidly accumulate on vessels. West
winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and waves 3 to 6 feet
expected.

* WHERE...Saxon Harbor WI to Black River MI.

* WHEN...For the Heavy Freezing Spray Warning, from 1 PM EST
/noon CST/ this afternoon to 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ Wednesday.
For the Gale Warning, until 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in heavy freezing spray is
hazardous. Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic
components inoperative. Rapid ice accretion on decks and
superstructures may result in a catastrophic loss of
stability. Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for dangerous accumulation of ice on
their vessel. If possible, remain in port, avoid the warning area
or conduct mitigation.

Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM EST /3 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY... ...HEAVY FREEZING SPRAY WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY
